page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: When I get up in the morning I go downstairs to have my breakfast. I usually have cornflakes with milk. Then I go upstairs to get dressed. If it's a school day I wear my school clothes but if it's a weekend I wear jeans and a jumper. Then I clean my teeth. On Saturday we usually go shopping to buy next week's food, and then we come home for our dinner. We grow most of our vegetables in our garden. After dinner we sometimes play with our friends, or we might go out with our parents. We come home for tea at about 6.00 and then we might watch the television or read until bedtime. If it's summer we can go out to play again, but in the winter it gets dark too early.
